telegraphic: Answer small. No details. Fragment only.
Plan good. Words broken. Syntax missing.
Data fine. Explanation short. No linking words.
normal: This is a coherent answer that uses normal grammar and function words.
The system explanation is clear, connected, and written in full sentences.
This response provides a detailed, well-structured description of the behaviour.
The answer flows logically and maintains proper syntax and function words.
This sentence demonstrates fluent language without telegraphic patterns.
